DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine what can activate brown adipose tissue (BAT).
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Brown Adipose Tissue Activation in Humans
DOC.detailed_description: We will investigate different stimuli (i.e. hormones) to determine which can stimulate BAT.
DOC.criteria: aged >18 years medical conditions recreational drug use participation in other trials within the preceding 2 months blood donation within 3 months of study participation
